Current actual configuration of the resource. It can contain 0 to 256 characters, which is the non-compliant configuration of the resource.

members.name: DesiredValue

members.document: Comparison operator between current and desired configuration of the resource. Length is 0-16 characters. This field may be empty when custom rule reporting evaluation result.
members.name: Operator

members.document: JSON path of current configuration in resource attribute structure. Length is 0-256 characters. This field may be empty when custom rule reporting evaluation result.

Evaluated resource type.

QCS::CVM::Instance、 QCS::CBS::Disk、QCS::VPC::Vpc、QCS::VPC::Subnet、QCS::VPC::SecurityGroup、 QCS::CAM::User、QCS::CAM::Group、QCS::CAM::Policy、QCS::CAM::Role、QCS::COS::Bucket
